title: Balloon tip text not visible
body:
Notifications are displayed as empty yellow baloon tips; the text inside the popup is not visible.
OS: Xubuntu 13.04 (Xfce)
Mumble is installed from the Ubuntu repository.
Style is set to System default.


 


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1023/ .
